invention: sustainable and efficient solution for beetroot farming
problem: risk of losing personal belongings and inconvenience of carrying multiple cards
features: monitors soil moisture, temperature, and nutrient levels; provides real-time insights and recommendations; integrates with mobile and web applications
functionality: securely store credit cards, IDs, and cash, make contactless payments using a linked mobile app
prototypes: working prototypes have been developed and tested
What existing technologies or products a: There are several existing technologies and products that attempt to solve similar problems to the proposed solution. One example is the use of advanced imaging techniques, such as functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) and computed tomography (CT), which provide detailed images of the brain to help surgeons plan and navigate during surgical procedures. Another example is the use of robotic surgery systems, which offer greater precision and control during delicate operations.; ; In comparison to these existing technologies, the proposed solution offers a unique combination of advanced imaging, robotic precision, and real-time feedback, allowing for even more accurate and safer surgical procedures. By integrating these features, the proposed solution aims to improve surgical outcomes and reduce the risk of complications for patients undergoing brain surgery.
title: Smart Wallet
category: Financial Technology (FinTech) and Personal Finance Management tools
future potential use 1: integration with advanced data analysis and tracking systems
unique features: efficiently harness and store energy from multiple sources, including solar, wind, and kinetic energy
benefits: reduces reliance on traditional power sources, ensures continuous and sustainable supply of energy, even in remote or off-grid locations
applications: powering small electronic devices, providing backup power for homes and businesses
origin: passion for beetroot farming and experience in an office job
development process: extensive research, feedback gathering, and collaboration with experts
purpose: increase crop yields and profitability for farmers
research plans: conducting extensive field tests, gathering data, and analyzing the results
goal: create a sustainable and efficient solution for beetroot farming
